fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: The main EU files followed are:  IPR Enforcement; Customs; Trade and Home Affairs
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: To co-ordinate the international activities of national and regional IPR enforcement associations. International research and public awareness campaigns on IPR enforcment. The development of IPR enforcement in the emerging economies.
relevant_communication: Main relevant activities are: World Anti-Counterfeiting Day; GAC Awards and collaboration with various EU institutions for lobbying on the above files with a special focus on IPR enforcement in 3rd countries.
